content: I was re-reading/checking some parts of the guide and in particular I always have the same feeling about the Contributing to Rust whole section, from chapter 6 to 18
my feeling is I like the idea of having a contributing to Rust section
chapter 6 and 7 are great
chapter 8 and 9 are nice too
chapter 10 is fine or maybe not so ... :)
and from chapter 11 to 18 my feeling is that that's more suited for forge
we've had this discussion a ton of times with some different opinions ... maybe this is a thing to briefly discuss and decide on our next meeting
my opinion would be to move a bunch of dense stuff from there to procedures on forge and then maybe we can link from the guide to forge

so we guide can be more about how the compiler works with a nice section about contributing but not soooo deep and with a lot of things that are not a must to understand how the compiler works or how to even contribute
I'd love if the guide is more like a book one could read from cover to cover
and these chapters are very specific procedures that one could go and check when needed
also
https://forge.rust-lang.org/compiler/cross-compilation/windows.html
there are procedures on forge that are more or less similar to what we have in the guide
https://forge.rust-lang.org/compiler/reviews.html
https://forge.rust-lang.org/compiler/membership.html
is also there
not sure right now but I think we have a membership chapter on forge, rustc-dev-guide and compiler-team :joy:
my feeling is that we should clean a bit more this and give each of those 3 things a more clear semantic
cc also @pnkfelix @Wesley Wiser
I remember that @nikomatsakis also was kind of in an agreement with me about these things

Santiago Pastorino said:

my feeling is that we should clean a bit more this and give each of those 3 things a more clear semantic

pinging you guys mainly about this :point_up:
the rest can be easily decided by the working group but major refactors on these 3 repos would need discussions at least with some of you :)

Santiago Pastorino said:

not sure right now but I think we have a membership chapter on forge, rustc-dev-guide and compiler-team :joy:

https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/compiler-team.html#team-membership
https://forge.rust-lang.org/compiler/membership.html#membership
https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/pull/398/files#diff-aa9fad2ac97fb6e5465bcbb4a615374cf15823eefc7dbd9856f32be372780505
we kind of talk about the 3 things in the 3 repos
